alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 4:50PM CST until December 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Howell and Oregon Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until Noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Whiteout conditions are expected and will make travel treacherous and potentially life-threatening.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
